profileSection.traitHint: Click any trait to ask the AI about what it means

help.title: Help Center
help.welcome: Welcome to the Xavigate Help Center. Here you'll find resources to help you navigate the platform and get the most out of your experience.
help.gettingStartedDesc: If you're new to Xavigate, start with our introductory guide to learn about the platform's key features and how to use them.
help.contactSupportDesc: Need additional help? Our support team is here for you. Email us at support@xavigate.com.

chat.placeholder: Share your thoughts or ask a question...
chat.noTraitScores: ⚠️ No trait scores found. Please complete the MNTEST first.
chat.welcomeDescription: I'm here to help you explore your natural traits and find greater alignment in your life. Our conversations will be most helpful when you share specific situations, patterns, or questions about how you engage with the world.

suggestions.title: Trait Recognition
suggestions.question: What traits might be showing up in my daily patterns?

suggestions.title: Alignment Diagnosis
suggestions.question: I feel drained after work meetings. Could this be misalignment?
suggestions.context: Identify potential misalignments in specific contexts

suggestions.title: Flow States
suggestions.question: When do I experience flow and how can I create more of it?

suggestions.title: Relationship Patterns
suggestions.question: How might my traits influence my interactions with others?
suggestions.context: Explore interpersonal dynamics through trait awareness

chat.finalPrivacyNote: Your conversation is private and designed to help you explore alignment in your own life

accountView.title: Account Settings
accountView.description: Manage your profile and account settings

profileTab.saveError: Failed to update profile, please try again.

passwordTab.description: Update your password to keep your account secure.
passwordTab.minLengthError: Password must be at least 8 characters.

errors.userNotFound: No account found for that email address. Please register first.
errors.notConfirmed: Your email is not confirmed. Please check your inbox for the confirmation link.

register.title: Register
register.termsLabel: I agree to the Terms and Conditions
register.successMessage: We've sent a verification link to {{email}}. Please check your inbox.

errors.usernameExists: An account with this email already exists. Please sign in.

resend.success: Verification email resent. Please check your inbox.

onboarding.title: Welcome to the Xavigate Journey
onboarding.intro: We’re thrilled to have you here! Our mission is to help you uncover your natural talents and make aligned life choices. This journey is designed to be simple, insightful, and tailored just for you.
benefits: Understand your natural talents and behavioral tendencies.
Align your decisions with your core motivations and values.
Gain practical guidance to navigate life’s important choices.
onboarding.prompt: Are you ready to begin your journey?
onboarding.agreeLabel: I have read and agree to the
